title: PomMom2
author: PomMom2
content: Making a thread for crypto strategy games with high reward potential. Please leave recommendations here. Looking for some fun quick play games that have large crypto prizes and include some level of strategy game play Also hello - I'm new to the forum but happy this exists.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: The game plan with crypto(P2E) games is to get in and out as quickly as possible and just ride the hype; pretty much like trading coins that are being pump and dumped, but in this case slightly more complex.Also, a tip: in gold rushes, invest in shovels.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, pommom2.NFT games are no longer a thing these days. If there are still some that are existing, they're just up for fun and earns a little from the rewards that they get there.Remember that these NFT games will require you to invest just for you to have a better threshold and chance of earning but even with that, they're no longer the same as before because of the bear market.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: There are no NFT games right now that give you big rewards but if you love a card game like splinterlands you can play on their tournaments with potentially big rewards. But this is not easy you need to have a good strategy, cards, and knowledge to be able to win in the tournament there are many smart players there but if you have good skills then you can win the game.Sometimes the game tournament rewards are around $1,000 in Dec.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: I'm sure if I ever find such game I wouldn't tell to anyone since it's where I will make large amount money in short time without need to deposit large amount lol. If I tell it to people, it will make me harder to maximize my profit since I need to share with the other players, more player will play the more difficult to get money. I remember Axie Infinity isn't a hard game before the hype, but during the hype the difficulty increase from 10 to 100. But the thing is there's no such thing anymore, all P2E and NFT games are worthless.
